title: Calorie Counter by Cronometer
description: Cronometer is more than a calorie counter. Cronometer is a powerful health, fitness and nutrition tracking app that gives you personalized insight into your diet, exercise, and nutritional intake data so you can make more informed decisions about your health. With Cronometer, a top health and nutrition app, you get a fitness tracker, calorie, macro, and micronutrient counter, diet planner, and nutrition coach, all in one place. Access to more than 1.1 million verified foods ensures that logging your meals is straightforward; with detailed data on the calories, vitamins, and minerals you're consuming. Whether you're trying to lose weight, build muscle, or simply improve your overall health, Cronometer is the perfect tool for tracking your nutrition and fitness goals. What you get with the app: - Nutrition, Calorie & Macro tracker - Free Barcode Scanner - Large, verified food database - Fitness Device integrations - Water Tracker - Sleep tracker - Diary Groups - Macro Scheduler - Track any diet Cronometer is designed for YOU. It is the calorie & macro tracker of choice for many health professionals; trusted by doctors, dietitians, and trainers. Dial up your diet & track your nutrition effortlessly with our app: Log your meals and see which of the essential 84 vitamins and minerals you’re getting the most and least of, helping you eat a more balanced diet. Reach & maintain your goal weight: Monitor your food intake with detailed food journaling, verified nutrition information, and a built-in nutritional target wizard to keep yourself accountable and reach your health or weight loss goals. Free Barcode scanner: Quickly scan barcodes with our free scanner for instant, highly accurate nutritional information. Track your food effortlessly and stay on top of your health goals. Large Food Database: Access a vast food database with 1.1 million entries, providing accurate nutrition information across 84 macro & micronutrients. The database consists of lab-analyzed entries that are vetted by qualified experts. Our database ensures you can confidently track your intake for the most accurate results. Get a holistic view of your health: Sync Cronometer with popular fitness tracking devices and track all your biometrics from pain symptoms to gut health to blood sugar levels and more. Cronometer integrates with Fitbit, Apple Watch, Samsung, Whoop, Withing, Oura, Qardio, Keto Mojo, Garmin, Strava, Dexcom, and many more. Water tracking: Stay on top of your hydration with our Water Tracker. Log daily intake, set goals, and monitor progress to support your hydration and weight loss journey. Enhanced sleep tracking: Import sleep data from various devices and access sleep metrics in the Diary, Dashboard, and Charts. Analyze sleep duration, stages, recovery, and correlations with nutrition, such as the effects of alcohol or caffeine. Cronometer on Wear OS Track calories, water intake, and macros directly from your watch. Unlock deeper insights with Cronometer Gold: Enjoy an ad-free experience and take advantage of advanced features that elevate your calorie & nutrition tracking. With Gold, you can effortlessly manage your fasting with the Fasting Timer, seamlessly import recipes from your favorite sites, and optimize your nutrition with the Macro Scheduler. Plus, track your progress over time with Time Stamps and create detailed Custom Charts, Whether you are a fitness enthusiast or just looking to improve your overall health, Cronometer is the perfect tool for tracking your calorie, food, nutrition, and fitness goals. Download the app today to start your nutrition tracking lifestyle! SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS By subscribing, you acknowledge to agree to the following: Terms of Use: https://cronometer.com/terms/ Privacy Policyhttps://cronometer.com/privacy/
descriptionHTML:
Cronometer is more than a calorie counter. Cronometer is a powerful health, fitness and nutrition tracking app that gives you personalized insight into your diet, exercise, and nutritional intake data so you can make more informed decisions about your health.

With Cronometer, a top health and nutrition app, you get a fitness tracker, calorie, macro, and micronutrient counter, diet planner, and nutrition coach, all in one place.

Access to more than 1.1 million verified foods ensures that logging your meals is straightforward; with detailed data on the calories, vitamins, and minerals you're consuming.

Whether you're trying to lose weight, build muscle, or simply improve your overall health, Cronometer is the perfect tool for tracking your nutrition and fitness goals.

What you get with the app:
- Nutrition, Calorie & Macro tracker
- Free Barcode Scanner
- Large, verified food database
- Fitness Device integrations
- Water Tracker
- Sleep tracker
- Diary Groups
- Macro Scheduler

- Track any diet
Cronometer is designed for YOU. It is the calorie & macro tracker of choice for many health professionals; trusted by doctors, dietitians, and trainers.

Dial up your diet & track your nutrition effortlessly with our app:
Log your meals and see which of the essential 84 vitamins and minerals you’re getting the most and least of, helping you eat a more balanced diet.

Reach & maintain your goal weight:
Monitor your food intake with detailed food journaling, verified nutrition information, and a built-in nutritional target wizard to keep yourself accountable and reach your health or weight loss goals.

Free Barcode scanner:
Quickly scan barcodes with our free scanner for instant, highly accurate nutritional information. Track your food effortlessly and stay on top of your health goals.

Large Food Database:
Access a vast food database with 1.1 million entries, providing accurate nutrition information across 84 macro & micronutrients. The database consists of lab-analyzed entries that are vetted by qualified experts. Our database ensures you can confidently track your intake for the most accurate results.

Get a holistic view of your health:
Sync Cronometer with popular fitness tracking devices and track all your biometrics from pain symptoms to gut health to blood sugar levels and more. Cronometer integrates with Fitbit, Apple Watch, Samsung, Whoop, Withing, Oura, Qardio, Keto Mojo, Garmin, Strava, Dexcom, and many more.

Water tracking:
Stay on top of your hydration with our Water Tracker. Log daily intake, set goals, and monitor progress to support your hydration and weight loss journey.

Enhanced sleep tracking:
Import sleep data from various devices and access sleep metrics in the Diary, Dashboard, and Charts. Analyze sleep duration, stages, recovery, and correlations with nutrition, such as the effects of alcohol or caffeine.

Cronometer on Wear OS
Track calories, water intake, and macros directly from your watch.

Unlock deeper insights with Cronometer Gold: Enjoy an ad-free experience and take advantage of advanced features that elevate your calorie & nutrition tracking. With Gold, you can effortlessly manage your fasting with the Fasting Timer, seamlessly import recipes from your favorite sites, and optimize your nutrition with the Macro Scheduler. Plus, track your progress over time with Time Stamps and create detailed Custom Charts,

Whether you are a fitness enthusiast or just looking to improve your overall health, Cronometer is the perfect tool for tracking your calorie, food, nutrition, and fitness goals. Download the app today to start your nutrition tracking lifestyle!

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS
